translated: A well-polished stone, finished by a man,
a pair of women held it, silently;
and when a second came, there was a sound,
having seen that, I went for alms.
A bird, carrying a dead bird,
many gathered around that one,
for the sake of food, they tore it apart,
having seen that, I went for alms.
In the middle of the herd, a bull elephant,
moving, with beauty and strength,
I saw it, agitated by the cause of desire,
having seen that, I went for alms.â€
